comments.body:
```suggestion

export as namespace stylis;

```
you folks probably want to support UMD, as per cocmment on the README:
https://github.com/thysultan/stylis.js#installation
If accepted, this would work:
```ts
stylis.serialize(stylis.compile(`h1{all:unset}`), stylis.stringify)
// "h1{all:unset;}"
```
Great catch thanks! Adding that now
